description: monument at left foreground; standing figure with other figures laying at his feet; inscriptions on monument base; church at center has two square spires with cone shaped top; smaller cone shapes at corners of square and partially up larger cones; arched doorways; center large arched stained glass window
marks:
Title, Inscription and Stamp

on verso bottom ed on verso at top, in pencil: [PRAHA - JOHN HUS MONU
title: John Hus Monument and the Old Hussite Church, Old Town Square
